title: Horns Halos
description: Jennifer Calvert’s debut poetry collection Horns Halos is not for the fainthearted.The poetry between these pages is of resilience and inner-strength,exploring the intricate emotions of love, both lost and found, self-loveand the empowered woman in the modern world.I was no angelmy halowas a dirty shade of greyand my wingsalmost never feltbehind my backI had fallenfrom grace’s loving armsinto the devils lap.
author: Jennifer  Calvert
